publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2814 Ms Sandra White: Sun-Tanning Parlours-That the Parliament notes with concern recent reports linking the operation of sun-tanning parlours with criminal activities; further notes the recent proliferation of such parlours particularly in Glasgow, and urges the Scottish Executive to instigate an immediate moratorium on the operation of sun-tanning parlours until such an investigation has been completed.

S1M-2814 Ms Sandra White: Sun-Tanning Parlours-That the Parliament notes with concern recent reports linking the operation of sun-tanning parlours with criminal activities; further notes the recent proliferation of such parlours particularly in Glasgow; urges the Scottish Executive to instigate an immediate investigation into the operation of sun-tanning parlours, and calls for a moratorium on the operation of sun-tanning parlours until such an investigation has been completed.

S1M-2814 Ms Sandra White: Suntanning Parloursâ€”That the Parliament notes with concern recent reports linking the operation of suntanning parlours with criminal activities; further notes the recent proliferation of such parlours particularly in Glasgow; urges the Scottish Executive to instigate an immediate investigation into the operation of suntanning parlours, and calls for a moratorium on the opening of any new parlours until such an investigation has been completed. Supported by: Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2814 Suntanning Parlours (lodged on 28 February 2002) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2814 Suntanning Parlours (lodged on 28 February 2002) Michael Russell*
